The game
Progress
Download

Galacticum is an infinite space game. Discover the universe and conquer planets!

Features

Infinite space
Explore an infinite 2D universe full of planets, opponents and resources. Discover unknown places with your space ship!
Space battles
Fight against hundreds of enemies with your self built weapons. Defend your planet by building more ships.
Conquer planets
It's time to build an empire. You can conquer hundreds of planets to create the biggest alliance in the universe!
Explosions
You can destroy everything in this game - planets, opponents, metroids and many more!
